title: Not getting boxes when teammates earn S ranks
body:
Not sure what going on. Multiple times this has happened. Myself or teammates have earned an S+, S, or S- and no boxes where given :(

Screenshots below prove I own the champion, that i still have 4 of 4 boxes, and that a team mate earned an S rank. 

[Pitures](http://imgur.com/a/yV4RZ)

replies.body:
Took a look at your last few games and it looks like you don't own the champion you were playing in those games where someone has earned an S. 

You can read more detailed information on our [Hextech Crafting Guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/207884233-Hextech-Crafting-Guide), but TL;DR is you need to own a champion to receive a chest for that champion.  If you earn an S, other members of your team can still earn a chest, as long as they own the champion they're playing at the time.

Hope this helps clarify!
If you take a look at the pictures it shows I own lee sin. Turns out I need to have a premade teammate get an S, not a random (Randoms getting and S has triggered the box for me.)
You don't get a box if a teammate gets an S, you get a box if someone in your *premade* gets an S.

> [{quoted}](name=Mysticman89,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=MLZgEhsj,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2016-04-13T03:02:21.428+0000)
>
> You don't get a box if a teammate gets an S, you get a box if someone in your *premade* gets an S.

To my knowledge, this is not true. In order to receive a box, the following must be true:

1. You must own the champion you're playing on.
2. You must not have earned a box on the champion you're playing on during that season.
3. Your teammate who S-ranked must NOT have ALREADY EARNED an S-rank on the champion THEY are playing on during that season.

I've received a couple of S-rank boxes from random party members, solo-queue in ranked. The thing to keep in mind is that if you're playing primarily ranked games, the champions that a person are proficient on (aka play regularly, and would more likely S-rank on) will probably be played more often. Meaning if it's not their first few games of the season, the likelihood that they've already S-ranked PRIOR to that game is higher. This prevents you from getting multiple chests from the same person playing the same champion. For example, I jungle primarily Elise and Kha'zix. I have S-ranks on both of those champions. Neither I (nor any other team members during this season where I get another S-rank) will receive another chest on either of those champions.

If I'm mistaken on this, I would love a red-post response and clarification (particularly on point #3).

It literally explains it in the link given by the red post.

Notably: 
> If someone in your premade group earns an S rank, you’ll receive a chest as well! The chest you receive is tied to the champion you’re playing, so that champion will be unable to earn more chests for this season.

> [{quoted}](name=Mysticman89,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=MLZgEhsj,comment-id=000100000000,timestamp=2016-04-13T14:59:53.785+0000)
>
> It literally explains it in the link given by the red post.
> 
> Notably:

Found it in that link:
If you're playing a champion you don't own, you can't earn a chest. 
If you do earn an S rank on a champion you don't own, allies in your premade group may still earn a chest through your achievement.

Thanks, for that. This makes more sense, and I must have been mistaken, and either I S-ranked or been queued with people who S-ranked in those games I was thinking I got from random strangers. I don't duo-queue often, so I didn't think that this was what was happening.

Cheers for the clarification.

i'm pretty sure you can still earn a box for someone else if you already got an S on the champion you played earlier in the season. I recall doing this in a premade with some guys but i had already earned the S on the champ i was playing (at least I'm pretty sure I had.)

> [{quoted}](name=RottedApples,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=MLZgEhsj,comment-id=000100000001,timestamp=2016-04-13T23:43:14.341+0000)
>
> i'm pretty sure you can still earn a box for someone else if you already got an S on the champion you played earlier in the season. I recall doing this in a premade with some guys but i had already earned the S on the champ i was playing (at least I'm pretty sure I had.)

It'd be interesting of RIOT allowed this. You could essentially duo-queue and get chests on every single champion while letting your friend play only 1 or 2 of their absolute best champs and S-rank every game (or near enough to make no difference), capping your chest-gain.

Not that this really makes a huge difference considering the droprate on keys, so unless you're going to end up spending RP on keys it doesn't really benefit you. Hell, I'm sitting on 2 fragments and 4 unopened chests right now, and I haven't even been focusing on chests, and rarely play with friends.
